function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Diminished sense of community in cities","Impact":"Challenges in pandemic response and recovery processes","Mitigation":"Implement community-building initiatives and programs","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms and social networks","People":"Residents of cities","Owner":"Local government and community organizations"},{"Description":"Neglect of border closure policies by rich urbanites","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases to indigenous communities","Mitigation":"Enforce strict adherence to border closure policies, educate the public on the risks, and impose penalties for non-compliance","Technologies":"Geofencing and surveillance systems","People":"Indigenous communities, rich urbanites","Owner":"Local government and law enforcement agencies"},{"Description":"Social inequalities and right to housing issues","Impact":"Risk of exacerbating social inequalities and housing crises","Mitigation":"Implement policies to address housing rights, provide financial support, and create affordable housing initiatives","Technologies":"Data analytics for identifying housing needs, online platforms for housing assistance","People":"Marginalized communities, individuals facing housing issues","Owner":"Government and housing organizations"}]}
